header_summary: I'm sorry, but you haven't provided the actual text that needs to be summarized. Could you please provide the text from the mailing lists that you want to be transformed into a brief summary?

active_posts.title: Ordinals BIP PR
active_posts.summary:
- The email requests clarification on why an Ordinals BIP PR remains unaddressed for nine months.
- The sender underscores the informational nature of BIPs and their non-binding impact on consensus.
- Seeking progress, the sender urges the BIP editors for feedback or required changes for acceptance.

active_posts.title: A proposal for a "PSBT for descriptors" format
active_posts.summary:
- SeedHammer introduces a compact metal backup descriptor with potential PSBT binary encoding.
- The descriptor adheres to BIPs standards and supports Miniscript, excluding inline keys.
- Feedback is sought on encoding methods and descriptor integration before BIP formalization.

active_posts.title: Bitcoin Core 26.0 release candidate 3 available
active_posts.summary:
- Bitcoin Core's new release candidate v26.0rc3 is ready for download.
- Preliminary release notes detailing changes are available on GitHub.
- If testing finds no critical issues, v26.0rc3 will become the official release.

active_posts.title: Liquidity Ads: Updated Spec Posted, please review
active_posts.summary:
- Liquidity Ads specification transitioned from CSV to CLTV for locking leasor funds.
- Variable lease terms introduced, with rate adjustments for lease length flexibility.
- Community feedback prompted channel fee cap increments refinement and fraud proof additions.

active_posts.title: Mailing List Future
active_posts.summary:
- The recent meeting reviewed the current mailing list's year-end shutdown, evaluating alternative platforms.
- Concerns were raised about Google Groups and GitHub discussions; hosting a mailman instance was offered.
- A vote on the platform choice will occur after further discussion at the next scheduled meeting.
